description:
Keep your hands happy through long hours of saddle time. The padding on these gloves is positioned to work in harmony with your bone structure, while lightweight wicking fabric technology uses your sweat to cool things down.

  • Glove padding bridges the ulnar and median nerves for superior comfort
  • Glove fit minimizes bunching at the palms for enhanced grip and handlebar feel
  • Synthetic leather palms are soft and durable
  • Easy-off glove removal tab
  • Soft, low-profile wiping surface on thumb
  • Hook-and-loop closure
name: Pearl Izumi Elite Gel Gloves - Women's
